mapper.insert: insert into r_match_log (uuid, is_del, creater, updater, create_time, update_time, match_result_uuid, user_uuid, log_type, coin_amount, remark, coin_index) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{matchResultUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coinAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coinIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select uuid, is_del, creater, updater, create_time, update_time, match_result_uuid, user_uuid, log_type, coin_amount, remark, coin_index from r_match_log
